text: Oh, welcome! Are you new to GoonBlock?

name: Goony
text: So, for starters, my name is§d Gwendolyn...§f or you could just call me§o Goony...§r

name: Goony
text: How the mod is now, everything but the really§c insane§f stuff is enabled. To change this, use /goon to change your config.
